bibl.title: The Artaba, and Egyptian Grain-Measures.
bibl.note: Study of the information that can be obtained from demotic texts of Ptolemaic Egypt on the grain-measure called the artaba.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology

bibl.seg: Vleeming Sven P., The Artaba, and Egyptian Grain-Measures.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology (Chico, 1981) pp. 537-545.
Study of the information that can be obtained from demotic texts of Ptolemaic Egypt on the grain-measure called the artaba.
